msbt.message: The day of our battle with the bugs has finally arrived!You have to tiptoe silently up on these bugs so they don't hear or see you comingStay frosty, !
For the Bug-Off, the more you catch, the more prizes you getIf you're going to go for a prize, you might as well go for the ultimate one, the coveted gold bug trophy!

There's an entry fee for the Bug-Off, you know. Might as well start visualizing victory right there.First you have to talk to Flick. Then you let your muscles take over, and you catch everything in sight!
If you wanna participate in the big Bug-Off, you have to talk to Flick in the plaza, . Then catch as many bugs as you can! Sounds simple, but it actually calls for a refined technique.
I've been trying to train my mind to concentrate better so I can sneak up on bugs, ! I creep up on my tippy toes with my net ready, and then<10_4 /> "Woosh!" I swing my net and catch the critter!
